title: Digital Media and Political Communication
description: The process of political communication has been undergoing transformation across the world through the rise of digital media. The transformation is also the result of the way established institutions, including political parties and news organisations, have changed, and the ways citizens are engaging with politics and media. This module is designed to introduce students to the field of political communication – an interdisciplinary field of study. It will also help students to understand contemporary challenges and opportunities.
preclusion:
NM4245 Political Communication and Digital Media
NM6211 Political Communication
